articles.title: Delhi logs 628 new COVID-19 cases, three more deaths
articles.description: Delhi's Covid case tally has reached 19,32,026 while the death toll stands at 26,256. The department had not issued a health bulletin on Sunday. On Saturday, the city saw six deaths due to COVID-19 while the positivity rate stood at 7.8 per cent.
articles.content: Delhi reported 628 new Covid cases and three more deaths due to the infection on Monday, while the positivity rate stood at 8.06 percent, according to data shared by the city health department here. … [+2351 chars]

articles.title: Six airbags to be made mandatory in eight-seater vehicles: Gadkari
articles.description: India Business News: NEW DELHI: The government will make it mandatory for carmakers to provide a minimum of six airbags in motor vehicles that can carry up to eight passen.
